name: Returnless WooCommerce connector
author: Returnless

sections.description:
As a webshop you want to handle your returns smoothly. A bad return experience is bad for your business, and in addition, it provides you and your colleagues with extra work.

At Returnless, we promise Sweatless Returns. We automate and simplify the return process for webshops. With clear return data you can make targeted decisions and you also optimize your customer service department and assortment. Within 5 minutes you install our WooCommerce plugin and you can get started right away.

Features

  • Returns solutions, seamlessly integrated into your WooCommerce environment
  • Process returns faster in our return portal
  • Prevent returns with return analytics
  • Generate vouchers to stimulate revenue retention
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin through the WordPress Plugin store.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
How do I install the Returnless plugin?

Click the button ‘install’ and use the plugin specifications above to connect your webshop.

Where can I find more information about Returnless?

Go to Returnless.com to learn more about the Returnless returns solution.

Who can I contact for more information?

If you have any questions regarding, feel free to contact support@returnless.com
sections.changelog:
1.0.5

  • Added compatibility with HPOS.

1.0.4

  • Added permission callback to the returnless/order endpoint.

1.0.3

  • Bug fixes

1.0.2

  • Added support for Sequential Order Numbers and Sequential Order Numbers Pro plugin.

1.0.1

  • Changed API Endpoint

1.0.0

  • Initial release of our plugin.
